timeline.title: Finding our Feet.
timeline.overview: Geolytix wins their first major projects with retailers they still support today.

timeline.title: GeoData.
timeline.overview: We realise the data we are building is valuable for everyone. Retail Places, a labour of love is finalised.

timeline.title: Recognition.
timeline.overview: Our contribution to the Open Data world is recognised at the ODI Awards. Without Open Data we wouldn't exist.

timeline.title: Further afield.
timeline.overview: Our first Europe wide projects are completed. We also test out the water with our first online mapping tool.

timeline.title: Innovation.
timeline.overview: An invite to Buckingham Palace after GEOLYTIX proudly wins the Queens Award for Innovation; world class omnichannel forecasting.

timeline.title: Asia Pacific.
timeline.overview: Exciting times as we focus on APAC with offices opening in Shanghai and Tokyo. Second UK office in Leeds.

timeline.title: GEOLYTIX MAPP.
timeline.overview: We enter the online mapping market with a platform that enables an easy way to interrogate, analyse and visualise and our customers love it.

timeline.title: Mobility Data.
timeline.overview: We've used mobility data since 2012 but this year it takes off. We relish the added understanding of channel & the market that it provides.

timeline.title: Global.
timeline.overview: We're now building data and delivering projects in over 50 countries. We open down under in Melbourne and top off the year as Data IQ winners.

timeline.title: What next?
timeline.overview: We'll help more customers in more industries in more countries. Better decisions where location matters.
